references.paper_title: MixMatch: A Holistic Approach to Semi-Supervised Learning
references.reason: This paper proposes MixMatch, a semi-supervised learning method that uses data augmentation and consistency regularization to improve performance, which is highly relevant to the current work.
This book chapter provides a foundational overview of semi-supervised learning, the primary focus area of the research.

references.paper_title: Deep Residual Learning for Image Recognition
references.reason: This paper introduces the ResNet architecture used in the discriminator of the proposed method.

references.paper_title: Deep Unsupervised Learning using Nonequilibrium Thermodynamics
references.reason: This paper introduces diffusion probabilistic models, the core technique used in the proposed data augmentation method.

references.paper_title: ImageNet Classification with Deep Convolutional Neural Networks
references.reason: This paper is a seminal work in deep learning that demonstrates the success of convolutional neural networks, providing relevant background to the field.
